txt.en: Marton's steeds can be found in the farmlands.\n\nYou should examine the steeds, and determine why some are dead and some have been left alive.
This dead steed is pale of coat ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Marton's steeds can be found in the farmlands.\n\nYou should examine the steeds, and determine why some are dead and some have been left alive.

The White Hand Orcs had planned to use the darker horses for perhaps a worse fate than the slain ones -- to parade them around as their own, decorated with the White Hand of Isengard. The good beasts would surely have been twisted and abused in the service of their new masters.\n\nHopefully the beasts will have the sense to run east, away from the coming war.
Marton's steeds can still be heard neighing in the farmlands, though many corpses also litter the fields.\n\nYou should investigate why the Orcs slaughtered some and let others live.
